name: Epic Age Clicker slay legendary bosses & monsters
name_original: Epic Age Clicker slay legendary bosses & monsters
description:
Hordes of monsters have inundated the lands of the peaceful kingdom. Lead a campaign against them, banish them from your homeland and destroy them at their source in the very heart of the Evil Empire!
Upgrade your heroes.
Rise your power.
Let's tap.

Your personal army: 3 unique heroes. 33 pieces of gear and weapons for the heroes. Tons of magick jewels to encrust.

Your incredible power: 80+ tap effect customization. 6 devastating active skills. New world and new experiences from Ascension.

Your adventure: explore 15 diverse lands, slay over 100 type of monsters, сhallenge the bosses

Be brave and start your journey!
